Key Match Events: Thomas hit a grand slam off Skubal, contributing significantly to the Guardians' victory.
Ramírez was hit by a pitch, allowing Giménez to score and tying the game.
Thomas reached on an infield single, allowing Kwan to score.
Rocchio singled to center, allowing Giménez to score.
Post-Match Reflections: The Cleveland Guardians celebrated their victory by making a semi-circle in the middle of their clubhouse and emptying champagne and beer bottles on each other as 'Rocky Top' blasted through the speakers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was held at Progressive Field in Cleveland, Ohio, with an attendance of 34,105.
The game lasted 3 hours and 8 minutes.
